conbody.p: The contracting officer shall insert the clause at 52.246-6 , Inspection-Time-and-Material and Labor-Hour, in solicitations and contracts when a time-and-material contract or a labor-hour contract is contemplated. If Government inspection and acceptance are to be performed at the contractorâ€™s plant, the contracting officer shall use the clause with its AlternateI.
